DOC.brief_summary: Use of on-line blood volume monitoring during continuous renal replacement therapy can improve volume management in acute kidney injury patients requiring renal replacement
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Versus Conventional Volume Management During CRRT (Continuous Renal Replacement Therapy)
DOC.criteria: Patients with kidney injury requiring continuous renal replacement therapy and volume removal unable to provide or obtain patient consent not expected to survive 48 hours
